name: inca
description: Grab configuration files from network infrastructure.
author: Lee Keitel <onesimussystems@gmail.com> (http://onesimussystems.com)

scripts.build: yarn run build:js:prod && yarn run build:css
scripts.build:dev: yarn run build:js:dev && yarn run build:css
scripts.build:css: for file in frontend/src/styles/*.less; do lessc --clean-css $file frontend/dist/css/$(basename $file .less).css; done
